TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ViewStateException extends System.Exception implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class ViewStateException Inherits Exception
public ref class ViewStateException sealed : Exception
type ViewStateException = class inherit Exception interface ISerializable

summary.span: 表示當檢視狀態無法載入或驗證時所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: Represents the exception that is thrown when the view state cannot be loaded or validated.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁面載入的檢視狀態資訊的頁面時，就會發生的例外狀況，建立物件，並將它當做內部例外狀況內傳遞例外狀況。If an exception occurs when the page loads the view-state information, the page creates a object and passes it as an inner exception within an exception. 例外狀況是由應用程式重新擲回。The exception is re-thrown to be handled by the application. 類別會儲存在例外狀況資訊屬性。The class stores information about the exception in the property. 如果要求具備存取權限屬性，則屬性包含傳回的值， ， ， ， ，以及[屬性]，否則，屬性包含檢視狀態的一般錯誤訊息。If the request has permission to access the property, then the property contains the values returned from the , , , , , and properties; otherwise, the property contains a generic view-state error message. 檢視狀態例外狀況可以是訊息驗證碼 (MAC) 驗證錯誤的結果。A view-state exception can be the result of a Message Authentication Codes (MAC) validation error. 如果頁面屬性`enableViewStateMac`設為`true`，檢視狀態資訊編碼與 MAC 的識別項。If the page attribute `enableViewStateMac` is set to `true`, view-state information is encoded with a MAC identifier. 當檢視狀態資訊回傳至伺服器時，頁面會驗證要確定，它未被改變使用者的編碼方式。When the view-state information is posted back to the server, the page verifies the encoding to ensure that it has not been altered by the user. 如果頁面無法驗證檢視狀態資訊編碼的 MAC，則會擲回例外狀況物件做為內部例外狀況。If the page cannot validate the MAC encoding on the view-state information, it will throw an exception with the object as an inner exception. MAC 驗證成功，檢視狀態資訊必須是雜湊由相同的索引鍵時傳送和接收。For MAC validation to succeed, the view-state information must be hashed by the same key when it is sent and received. Web 伺服陣列中每一部伺服器上的電腦金鑰應該設定為相同的索引鍵。Within a Web farm, the machine key on each server should be set to a common key. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作的方法，將 base64 編碼的字串還原序列化，並傳回屬性設定的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a method that deserializes a base64-encoded string and returns an collection of property settings. 方法會擲回例外狀況，其中包含物件做為內部例外狀況。The method can throw an exception that contains a object as an inner exception. 此範例示範您可以攔截例外狀況，並擷取從屬性物件。The example shows how you can catch an exception and retrieve the properties from the object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ViewStateException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ViewStateException/CS/Class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ViewStateException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ViewStateException/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回相同的值，與呼叫屬性。This property returns the same value as calling the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作的方法，將 base64 編碼的字串還原序列化，並傳回屬性設定的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a method that deserializes a base64-encoded string and returns an collection of property settings. 方法會擲回例外狀況，其中包含物件做為內部例外狀況。The method can throw an exception that contains a object as an inner exception. 此範例示範您可以攔截例外狀況，並擷取從屬性物件。The example shows how you can catch an exception and retrieve the properties from the object. summary.span: 取得造成檢視狀態例外狀況之 HTTP 要求的偵錯資訊。

span.span: Gets debugging information about the HTTP request that resulted in a view-state exception.

value.span: ，包含例外狀況資訊的格式化訊息。

span.span: A containing the formatted message with information about the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要求沒有存取伺服器變數的權限，這個屬性會傳回一般的檢視狀態錯誤訊息。If the request does not have permission to access the server variables, then this property returns a generic view-state error message. 如果要求沒有權限來存取伺服器變數屬性包含傳回的值， ， ， ， ，和屬性。If the request does have permission to access server variables, the property contains the values returned from the , , , , , and properties.

summary.span: 取得造成檢視狀態例外狀況之 HTTP 要求的路徑。

span.span: Gets the path of the HTTP request that resulted in a view-state exception.
A containing the path from the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回相同的值`PATH_INFO`變數中屬性。This property returns the same value as the `PATH_INFO` variable in the property. 主機名稱之後，它就會傳回路徑的一部分。It returns the portion of the path after the host name. 例如，在 URL http://www.contoso.com/virdir/page.html，會傳回 /virdir/page.html。For example, in the URL http://www.contoso.com/virdir/page.html, would return /virdir/page.html. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作的方法，將 base64 編碼的字串還原序列化，並傳回屬性設定的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a method that deserializes a base64-encoded string and returns an collection of property settings. 方法會擲回例外狀況，其中包含物件做為內部例外狀況。The method can throw an exception that contains a object as an inner exception. 此範例示範您可以攔截例外狀況，並擷取從屬性物件。The example shows how you can catch an exception and retrieve the properties from the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回相同的值`HTTP_REFERER`變數中屬性。This property returns the same value as the `HTTP_REFERER` variable in the property. 值為空字串 ("") 如果沒有上一個要求連結至頁面。The value is an empty string ("") if no previous request linked to the page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作的方法，將 base64 編碼的字串還原序列化，並傳回屬性設定的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a method that deserializes a base64-encoded string and returns an collection of property settings. 方法會擲回例外狀況，其中包含物件做為內部例外狀況。The method can throw an exception that contains a object as an inner exception. 此範例示範您可以攔截例外狀況，並擷取從屬性物件。The example shows how you can catch an exception and retrieve the properties from the object.
